name: Python
tagline: My journey to learning computation with Python
body:
### Computor's Journal
* I wanna learn to do computation using computer.
* I tried several time learning c, but I never can say that I know c.
* I restarted, this time with Python. People say nice of it.
* I start learning Python at [Codecademy](http://www.codecademy.com), practicing with the basic concepts, Being aware of and appreciating their preaching that Python is all about automation.
* I used **Matlab** to remove random dots in my _Tif_ files.
* I used Matlab to peek into my .dta file. I later also used Python to crack the .dta.


### Aha moments
* Turing's machine, computational completeness.
* 

When I We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### Landmarks
* 2013-10 I do Python Challenge
* 2013-12 I've solved 40 [projecteuler problems](http://projecteuler.net/)
*

### The inward journey
* English is true obstacle for those with EaaSL.
* I always feel my code is somehow ugly.
*
